column5: We here at our home have always things that we do at New Years,Â  Parties, funny shirts, great food, many wine types and beverages. Your traditions and best memories are what????
I have not rung in the new year in many years. I like to start the year off fishing, so early to bed ,early to rise. No different this year. That is my tradition .
Going to bed, not hammered.Â  Get up the ext morning and bang on the burn barrel, lol.Â Â  Maybe even go drown a roebag tomorrow.

Many years ago it was the wild party my Aunt and Uncle threw every year. Our neighbour, Terry, would dress up as the old year. My Uncle would be dressed,Â  wearing nothing but a giant diaper,Â as the baby New Year.Â  It was a good thing we all lived within crawling distance. Today our household does nothing.Â  I usually go ice fishing.

Every New Years Eve for the 53 years we've been married...'cept the ones I worked...we've ordered in a huge feast of Chinese food and tonight will be no exception and I'm picking it up at 5:00. I should be about 6 pounds heavier this time tomorrow LOL
Were having burritos Lew. Need something to keep the heat in the suit in the morning.
Hope you're fishing downwind of me tomorrow..ðŸ¤£
If your drowning roe bags,you will be well safe.

It was tradition for a few of us kids to visit the EMERG in Hamilton every New Years day. We would try and ski down the ungroomed hill that we Hamiltonians call a mountain. Not a smart thing to try. Then when we got older hanging around 1000 other Italians at dinner dances was in vogue, still is. We actually went 3 years ago. I wanted to leave around 10 but was the designated driver. I can't do the Hustle like I once did circa 77'. When I was a kid in the early 60's it was traditional that neighbours and Dad would bring out the shotguns and fire off a few at midnight. Tragically one night some duffus on the mountain fired off a slug and a little girl was killed. That tradition thankfully ended.
I lay on the couch eating over priced pizza, drinking rum and watching hockey.Â ðŸ˜œ
That was me last night. Hit the sack at 7PM.Â Â ðŸ˜‚
